judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John G. Hanna, with him David G. Baldus, Harry K. McNamee, and Metz, Gook, Hanna & Kelly, and Marshall, Marshall, McNamee é MacFarlane, for appellants.
